definition: relating to or used in chemistry, material produced by or used in a reaction involving changes in atoms or molecules
details:
adjective
- relating to or used in chemistry
= example: relating to or used in chemistry
= synonyms: chemic
- of or made from or using substances produced by or used in reactions involving atomic or molecular changes
= example: of or made from or using substances produced by or used in reactions involving atomic or molecular changes
noun
- material produced by or used in a reaction involving changes in atoms or molecules
= synonyms: chemical substance
